description.description: Free text details about the storage definition.

enabled.description: Boolean string to indicate if the storage definition can be used.

bulkSize.description: Size of chunks to harvest at a time. Deprecated.

currentStatus.description: Status of the storage definition. Deprecated.

retryCount.description: Number of times to retry storage operation. Deprecated.

retryWait.description: Seconds to wait between retries. Deprecated.

timeout.description: Seconds to wait before giving up a storage operation. Deprecated.
